TestCase.author: apetrovsky@aras.com
TestCase.Description: Tests for dynamic assignments on GECO PreRelease CAD Workflow during path from Planning to End.

Request.Comments: Given: cadUser1 When: add new GECO as cadUser1 Then: Should create GECO
Given: cadUser1 and new GECO When: Get new GECO Then: State of GECO should be 'In Planning'
Given: cadUser1 and new GECO When: As cadUser1 Get active InBasket Task Then: InBasket Task is returned Which means that workflow has been instantiated
Given: InBasket Task Id When: Get Activity with Tasks and 'Start CAD Task' path assigned to the given InBasket Task Id Then: Activity Is Returned
Given: Activity from previous request When: Evaluate this Activity Then: Activity has been evaluated by 'Start CAD Task' path
Given: cadUser1 and GECO When: Get new GECO Then: State of GECO should be 'In Work'
Given: cadUser2 and new GECO When: As cadUser2 Get active InBasket Task Then: InBasket Task is returned Which means that workflow has been instantiated
Given: InBasket Task Id When: Get Activity with Tasks and 'Start Review' path assigned to the given InBasket Task Id Then: Activity Is Returned
Given: Activity from previous request When: Evaluate this Activity Then: Activity has been evaluated by 'Start Review' path
Given: cadUser1 and GECO When: Get new GECO Then: State of GECO should be 'In Review'
Given: cpartuser and new GECO When: As cpartuser Get active InBasket Task Then: InBasket Task is returned Which means that workflow has been instantiated
Given: InBasket Task Id When: Get Activity with Tasks and 'C-Part Check completed' path assigned to the given InBasket Task Id Then: Activity Is Returned
Given: Activity from previous request When: Evaluate this Activity Then: Activity has been evaluated by 'C-Part Check completed' path
Given: cadUser1 and GECO When: Get new GECO Then: State of GECO should be 'In Review'
Given: normUser and new GECO When: As normUser Get active InBasket Task Then: InBasket Task is returned Which means that workflow has been instantiated

Given: Activity from previous request When: Evaluate this Activity Then: Activity has been evaluated by 'Rework required' path

Given: cadUser2 and new GECO When: As cadUser2 Get active InBasket Task Then: InBasket Task is returned Which means that workflow has been instantiated
